# MTLSparseTextureRegionAlignmentMode.inward

**Case**

The tile region ignores partially covered tiles.

## Declaration

```swift
case inward
```

## Specifying the alignment mode

- **MTLSparseTextureRegionAlignmentMode.outward**: The tile region includes any partially covered tiles.
